item.title: About
item.description: Gregor Fabritius Born in 1982 in Transylvania and raised in Westerwald, Gregor studied computer science and a bit of psychology in Aachen before his profession took him to Berlin around 2010. Once there, he initially worked as a project engineer and later as a freelancer, before taking over Isotronic GmbH in 2017, which he has been managing ever since. #tech #science #ceo #isotronic #coding #cpp #golang #berlin #rwth [&]{}();
